data.what_is:
As a top-rated, award-winning consulting company, Alta Vista Technology specializes in taking your business's accounting, customer engagement, and business intelligence needs from concept to implementation and continual support. 

Offering the very best in cloud accounting as a Sage Intacct Premier Partner and Microsoft Dynamics Business Central Gold Partner we listen to our customers and work to form a solution that fits their business model and needs. With extended offerings such as Microsoft Dynamics 365 Customer Engagement and Microsoft Power BI as well as dozens of marketplace partners, we are equipped to create a complete solution while integrating the software you use every day. 

We handpick our team to ensure that you have the best people working for you and the world-class customer service you expect. No more waiting days for a response or emails going unanswered. You get the product your company needs and the support to keep it running. At Alta Vista Technology, we take pride in being part of your solution.
data.product_description: Alta Vista Technology is a Sage Intacct Premier Partner and Microsoft Gold Partner with over 600 sales and implementations. With offerings such as Sage Intacct, Dynamics Business Central, GP, Dynamics for Sales (CRM), Power BI, and Azure services they are equipped with the talent to tackle any business situation.
data.positioning_against_competitor: Alta Vista Technology is dedicated to finding the right solution, not the most expensive one. We craft a solution that fits your business and process and implement using our ClearPath Methodology which has a 100% success rate. Through this process, we make it a priority to provide world-class customer service. We do not succeed until our customer does.

pricing_plans.plan_description: Sage Intacct does not allow public pricing due to the wide variety of needs of different businesses. For pricing, please submit a request through our G2 page and someone will reach out to you within 1 business day!
Tier I implementation is your base package. Built for companies with basic accounting needs.
plan_features: Functionality:     GL,      AP,       AR,      Banking,      Cashflow

Features:      Implementation questionnaire and workshop,     Setup of a single company,      Import of master data,     Import of GL balances and net changes,      Import open AP and AR,     Creation of Balance Sheet, Income Statement, and Cashflow,       Training,      First Month End Closing support,      User personalization,      User account permissions
To request this package please visit https://bit.ly/2Svdn02 and fill out the form at the bottom of the services tab.

pricing_plans.plan_name: Microsoft Dynamics Business Central Financials & Distribution
pricing_plans.plan_description: Tier II implementation is designed for businesses with more advanced needs such as basic distribution and warehousing.
plan_features: Tier I Functionality plus: Sales Order Processing,  Purchase Order Processing,  Inventory Management,  Basic Warehouse Management

Tier I Features plus: Import of items,  Import item beginning balances , Setup and configure sales order processing,  Sales process training,  Setup and configuration of purchase order processing,  Purchase process training,  Modify standard Word template reports for sales and purchase orders,  Bin management,  Warehouse shipments and receipts,  Outlook integration,  Emailing documents (Invoices, Sales Orders, Purchase Orders)
To request this package please visit https://bit.ly/2Svdn02 and fill out the form at the bottom of the services tab.

pricing_plans.plan_name: Microsoft Dynamics Business Central Financials & Distribution +
pricing_plans.plan_description: Tier III is for customers that require advanced features and modules not common in other systems.
plan_features: Tier III typically includes one or more of the following:      Tier 2 Functionality plus     Jobs / Project Management,      Service Management,      Manufacturing,      Advanced Distribution,    Advanced Warehousing

Features for Tier III vary. To find the features needed for you company we will perform the following tasks to get a better view of your process:      Implementation questionnaire and business process review,      Functional requirements and fit/gap document.
To request this package please visit https://bit.ly/2Svdn02 and fill out the form at the bottom of the services tab.

pricing_plans.plan_name: Microsoft Dynamics Business Central Free Trial
pricing_plans.plan_description:
You can request a free 30 day trial of Microsoft Dynamics Business Central in the "Free Trial" tab in the following link:
https://www.altavistatech.com/microsoft-dynamics-365-business-central-information-hub/

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Alta Vista Technology?
I'd say Alta Vista's biggest strength is their team and their ability to actively listen in order to ask questions and provide feedback. Coupled with their great working knowledge of both GP and BC they were able to either match our current processes or improve them based on the new capabilities in BC.

What do you dislike about Alta Vista Technology?
Nothing comes to mind. They are very professional and open to discussions if any issues arise.

Recommendations to others considering Alta Vista Technology:
Ask as many questions as you can and be open to feedback. They are very easy to talk to so the more they know about your company and processes the more advice they can provide.

What problems is Alta Vista Technology solving and how is that benefiting you?
Converting our accounting software from Miscrosoft GP to Microsoft Business Central. We started the project with a different company before switching to Alta Vista about halfway through. I would honestly say that Alta Vista saved the project and turned it from a regret into something I wish we did sooner.

What do you like best about Alta Vista Technology?
Having David Cummings of Alta Vista serve as our system admin allows our team to have a subject matter expert at our disposal for any questions related to Intacct.

What do you dislike about Alta Vista Technology?
Having only David Cummings as our sole system admin can pose an issue if he ever leaves Alta Vista as the company knowledge he has gained would be lost in a painful transition.

What problems is Alta Vista Technology solving and how is that benefiting you?
David Cummings of Alta Vista has helped our team implement Sage Intacct but more recently assisted in implementing the purchasing module of Intacct. David also serves as a benefit to our team by frequently helping through troubleshooting of any issues with Intacct. He is always prompt and provides a detailed explanation that allows us to be autonomous in the future.

initial_reviews.review_title: A 1 stop shop for your tech consulting needs!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Alta Vista Technology?
They have a good reputation among my peers. Thet are responsive and can customize solutions to meet my needs

What do you dislike about Alta Vista Technology?
This solution can be cost prohibitive . It does rely on two different systems -this can limit flexibility if your business needs change or if you decide to switch to a different system in the future.

What problems is Alta Vista Technology solving and how is that benefiting you?
Alta Business is a consulting firm that can help with the following problems -
Updating systems to meet the current trends
Streamline processes
Provide solutions to growth issues

initial_reviews.review_title: Switched to Sage from Quickbooks with Alta Vista Technology after expansions and acquisitions
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Alta Vista Technology?
The personalized service and attention to detail. Alta Vista's project management and accountability is second to none.

What do you dislike about Alta Vista Technology?
If we didn't have internal IT at such a high level, I worry the transition into Sage utilizing the other software in our organization could have been a challenge.

Recommendations to others considering Alta Vista Technology:
If you are struggling with your current accounting software (particularly if you are in a growth stage, expanding out of Quickbooks), run! Don't walk.

What problems is Alta Vista Technology solving and how is that benefiting you?
Inter company transfers, multi entity P&L's, accurate reporting after outgrowing quickbooks.

What do you like best about Alta Vista Technology?
Behind the scenes project management that required little to no maintenance or additional time. On time and under budget project work.  The entire team was cooperative, we never had to ask a 2nd person for assistance.

What do you dislike about Alta Vista Technology?
I don't have anything we disliked about our team or any of their resources.  A lookback at the defined success factors during the project would be my only minor comment on the negative side.

Recommendations to others considering Alta Vista Technology:
Know that you have a solid technical team. They are experts in their field and provide world-class service.

What problems is Alta Vista Technology solving and how is that benefiting you?
Upgrading our processes to become digital vs paper and workpaper driven. Streamlining complex data collection and information dissemination. Updating technology to current.

initial_reviews.review_title: We had a very positive experience with Alta Vista's team and implmentation process.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Alta Vista Technology?
Knowledgeable staff on our implementation team, and they leveraged remote support as needed.

What do you dislike about Alta Vista Technology?
No complaints... the team was professional even when pushing us when we fell behind with tasks/items we were accountable for.

Recommendations to others considering Alta Vista Technology:
Trust in their process and implementation team will allow for a successful project.

What problems is Alta Vista Technology solving and how is that benefiting you?
Implementing the Sage system will allow us to manage multiple entities with many inter-company transactions better.

What do you like best about Alta Vista Technology?
Great customer support, helpful assistance for implementation, knowledgable team

What do you dislike about Alta Vista Technology?
Nothing so far, in my experience everything has been positive

What problems is Alta Vista Technology solving and how is that benefiting you?
Updating systems, implementing new models and processes

initial_reviews.review_title: AVT was great!  Always available and responded quickly to requests or questions.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Alta Vista Technology?
Friendly team, and the team is Accountants!  They understood my needs and questions and how to resolve them because they understood how the transactions should work.

What do you dislike about Alta Vista Technology?
I do not have any downsides to working with AVT.

What problems is Alta Vista Technology solving and how is that benefiting you?
Got us up and running on a more efficient accounting software!

What do you like best about Alta Vista Technology?
The incredible dedication, experience, and responsiveness of the team.  Our partners had exceptional knowledge of both the new and legacy systems.  The team was proactive and had the foresight to anticipate potential problem areas to keep our project on track.

What do you dislike about Alta Vista Technology?
Nothing to report here.  The team exceeded our expectations in every way!

Recommendations to others considering Alta Vista Technology:
You won't be disappointed!

What problems is Alta Vista Technology solving and how is that benefiting you?
Implementation of and conversion to Sage Intacct.  Alta Vista worked within our tight timeframe and prioritized activities to appropriately phase our organization into the new platform.  Doing so allowed for significant improvements and timely access information.  The result will be improved and timely reporting; improved budgeting and forecasting processes; and consolidation of entity financials.

What do you like best about Alta Vista Technology?
Alta Vista Technology staff was very professional, knowledgeable, resourceful and driven to ensure my project was successful. We had several complications throughout the project, yet their staff was always available and went the extra mile to ensure the project was ultimately a success. This included reaching out to our brokers and third-party support as project complications arised.

What do you dislike about Alta Vista Technology?
There wasn't anything in my experience in working with Alta Vista Technologies that I disliked. Their staff was readily available when I had questions and kept me informed of project status updates regularly.

Recommendations to others considering Alta Vista Technology:
I would highly recommend going with Alta Vista Technology. I have worked two projects with them - conversion from Dynamics SL to Sage Intacct for accounting and Integration of Addepar Brokerage Account Transactions into Sage Intacct, In both projects they work was outstanding.

What problems is Alta Vista Technology solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have over 50 brokerage accounts, every month, we manually input monthly summary accounting transactions into our Accounting Software to track company activity. Alta Vista Technology took the detailed transactions from our brokerage accounts via Addepar and brought them directly into our Accounting Software, generating the summary account transactions monthly.

initial_reviews.review_title: Great help in making us more productive in using Dynamics GP
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Alta Vista Technology?
The people we work with do a great job and are responsive especially when dealing with errors.

What do you dislike about Alta Vista Technology?
Sometimes we have to wait a few days to get the integrations built.

Recommendations to others considering Alta Vista Technology:
We have had three other Support companies, and if you use Dynamics GP then Alta Vista is the one you should use.

What problems is Alta Vista Technology solving and how is that benefiting you?
Alta Vista has helped us with a lot of problems, from error fixing to building integrations that make us more productive

initial_reviews.review_title: Intacct Implementation and Sales System Integration
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Alta Vista Technology?
The communication, speed and accuracy at which Alta Vista rectified the issue.

What do you dislike about Alta Vista Technology?
I have no complaints with the work done by Alta Vista.

What problems is Alta Vista Technology solving and how is that benefiting you?
Alta Vist was able to rectify the integration from our wholesale sales system to Intacct within 24 hours when the tech team for our sales system ended up getting stuck and was not able to customize their own integration for our needs.

initial_reviews.review_title: Alta Vista is a top notch service partner.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Alta Vista Technology?
Alta Vista is always attentive and gets right to our things when needed.  Also have the utmost professionalism

What do you dislike about Alta Vista Technology?
There is nothing not to like about Alta Vista.  Great people and wonderful service.

Recommendations to others considering Alta Vista Technology:
I would highly recommend Alta Vista for any accounting software needs.

What problems is Alta Vista Technology solving and how is that benefiting you?
Alta Vista assists us with the maintenance and programming of our accounting software.

What do you like best about Alta Vista Technology?
Quick turnaround and project management. Everything is thought out in detail and very easy to follow. Heather, Brandee, and Alan are a fantastic team. Strongly recommend working with them.

What do you dislike about Alta Vista Technology?
Nothing. They are team players; they help with everything, they make the project go as smoothly as possible, and the customer service is just amazing as the project management.

Recommendations to others considering Alta Vista Technology:
If you are looking to change accounting software, run it by AltaVista. You will never regret it.

What problems is Alta Vista Technology solving and how is that benefiting you?
It was the second time I worked with Altavista, and I am more than pleased. They were able to help us get thru the conversion possible in 6 weeks. It was unbelievable the support we got from them.

What do you like best about Alta Vista Technology?
AltaVista Technology was there every time we had an issue. Their resolution time and prompt answers made the transition very easy for us. Project management and the assigned technician worked very closely at every step.

What do you dislike about Alta Vista Technology?
I can't think of anything. So far, the transition has been perfect, and I have no complaints.

Recommendations to others considering Alta Vista Technology:
I would recommend AltaVista to everyone, colleagues, friends and family. Makes your life easier.

What problems is Alta Vista Technology solving and how is that benefiting you?
Accounting software upgrade

What do you like best about Alta Vista Technology?
Very responsive and knowledgeable, friendly.

What do you dislike about Alta Vista Technology?
Everything is awesome. You deserve a trophy.

Recommendations to others considering Alta Vista Technology:
None. Keep doing what you're doing!

What problems is Alta Vista Technology solving and how is that benefiting you?
New accounting software for large multi-entity business. Much easier intercompany tracking.

Describe the project or task Alta Vista Technology helped with:
AVT was hired to function as a support for an ERP implementation

What do you like best about Alta Vista Technology?
Consistent communications and availability. The resources provided were readily available and willing to support our project team. We made serval "out of nowhere" requests that was satisfied well before we expected.

What do you dislike about Alta Vista Technology?
Our internal project teams did most of the heavy lifting for our implementation. This was by design as our project scope had changed greatly throughout the engagement. By no means did this sour the experience, though it might have been nice for the resource to be a little more proactive. With that said, we were very pleased with all resources provided.

What problems is Alta Vista Technology solving and how is that benefiting you?
Alta vista technology was brought on to   work  primarily as a support function for the implementation/migration of an enterprise resource planning system. The system put in place allows us to source data from various systems into accounting software, which we use to generate invoices and bill clients.

What do you like best about Alta Vista Technology?
Customer support, quick response and very professional

What do you dislike about Alta Vista Technology?
Almost everything was a great experience

Recommendations to others considering Alta Vista Technology:
With Alta Vista Technology you get your thing DONE

What problems is Alta Vista Technology solving and how is that benefiting you?
Accounting, using the accounting platform sage50. Great support

initial_reviews.review_title: Couldn't have asked for a better implementation experience!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Alta Vista Technology?
Friendly, knowledgeable and responsive team. Always answered my questions quickly and assisted me in understanding any tasks I had questions on. The detailed project plan helped everything run smoothly and ensured we kept on track with time and budget.

What do you dislike about Alta Vista Technology?
Nothing to add here! Fortunately, all went well with implementation and every service they provided.

What problems is Alta Vista Technology solving and how is that benefiting you?
Software implementation from QB to Sage Intacct. Automated reporting and increased accuracy and efficiency in accounting tasks.

initial_reviews.review_title: Ed Christian Controller Faith in Action
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task Alta Vista Technology helped with:
Alta Vista helped our Organization with the integration of Nexonia and Intacct. The team of David Cummings and David Valade worked with our finance and operations team very timely, and both systems were up and operating in less than 72 hours.

What do you like best about Alta Vista Technology?
I like the fact that I can email the Alta Vista team, and someone will reply immediately.  With our past provider, we had to complete a support ticket and would not hear from them for days, if at all.

What do you dislike about Alta Vista Technology?
No complaints. The Alta Vista team is terrific.

Recommendations to others considering Alta Vista Technology:
Very knowledgeable professionals and you will be very please with engaging their team.

What problems is Alta Vista Technology solving and how is that benefiting you?
Automation and integration of our accounting processes and approvals.

initial_reviews.review_title: Great Experience Partnering with Alta Vista

initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task Alta Vista Technology helped with:
Alta Vista has been a trusted partner since their inception with our ERP implementation. The core team initially worked for another company that had initialy deployed and configured our system 15 years ago. Since then they have provided support and ongoing maintance to keep us up and running.

What do you like best about Alta Vista Technology?
The dedication and knowledge they have to present and deploy the best solution for the situations that arise. When something is wrong their abiltiy to track the issue down and correct it quickly.

What do you dislike about Alta Vista Technology?
At times staffing seems to be limited in specific knowledge areas. However, it has gotten better over the last year.
Better documentation of how they fixed a problem or how they configured something. By doing this it helps us in later troubleshooting.

What problems is Alta Vista Technology solving and how is that benefiting you?
Everyday problems are solved . One major problem was the automatic order placement between two companies. I automates all of the steps need to take an order from one company and have it fullfilled in another. This process saves time and is done with no erros.

initial_reviews.review_title: Alta Vista Technology performed successfully for A&F
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task Alta Vista Technology helped with:
Alta Vista implemented and continues to support Sage Intacct and Keyed In Enterprise software and integrations with our ERP system.  Brent Tobiczyk has been extremely responsive in the implementation and support role.

What do you like best about Alta Vista Technology?
Responsiveness and knowledge of software, configuration and integrations.

What do you dislike about Alta Vista Technology?
I can't think of anything I dislike.  They have me my expectations.

What problems is Alta Vista Technology solving and how is that benefiting you?
Alta Vista helped us graduate from our old accounting software and PM spreadsheets into a more scalable accounting and Project Management solution that integrates with our current CRM and HR software.  Benefits have included streamlining data entry and comprehensive data analysis and reporting.

initial_reviews.review_title: Alta Vista has tailored Dynamics 365 to fit our business.
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task Alta Vista Technology helped with:
As the owner of a construction company, any technologically driven decision I make must first be made considering my employees and their lack of knowledge with that usage of technology. That being said, I could not be happier with the care we have received and the subsequent training thereafter. I am witnessing older employees maneuver this software with ease, some of whom have never responded to an email. I can finally scale my business up without fear of overloading my previous, archaic system.

What do you like best about Alta Vista Technology?
Hands-on development, on-site training, and simplicity.

What do you dislike about Alta Vista Technology?
Teams meetings. Personally, I found it difficult to effectively communicate my issues. I had to have Mike here to physically show him.

What problems is Alta Vista Technology solving and how is that benefiting you?
I have not been able to grow my business for fear of overloading. Alta Vista has provided the platform that I believe will help us make the next step in revenue growth.

Describe the project or task Alta Vista Technology helped with:
Alta Vista assisted with the implementation and system integration of Sage Intacct.

What do you like best about Alta Vista Technology?
Alta Vista offers a talented group of individuals that are well informed, creative and supportive during the system conversion. The project management team effectively drove the project to completion.

What do you dislike about Alta Vista Technology?
Unfortunately, the organization had a staff turnover during the implementation. Despite the turnover, the Alta Vista team provided quality individuals to assist in the project completion.

What problems is Alta Vista Technology solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our previous accounting system was new in the marketplace and lacked several standard features. Alta Vista ensured a smooth conversion. One of the major benefits of implementing the accounting system is the enhanced speed to complete tasks and generate accurate system-generated reports. Our company will be able to reduce the number of OT hours going forward.
